titleStmt.title: An exhortation to the byshops to deale brotherly with theyr brethren

notesStmt.note: Suggested place of publication and printer, and publication date, from STC.

Includes an appeal to the bishops to answer "An admonition to the parliament" (STC 10847). Register is continuous. The appeal begins with a caption title on B1 recto that reads: An exhortation to the bishops and their clergie to aunsvver a little booke that came forthe the last parliament, and to other brethren to iudge of it by Gods worde, untill they see it aunsweared, and not to be caryed away with any repect of man.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
